actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Uses Dreadful Glare and makes one rotting fist attack.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.description: On hit DC 12 CON save or cursed with mummy rot: no healing, max HP -10 (3d6) each 24 hours; dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 max HP; remove curse or similar ends.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.description: Creature within 60 ft. that can see the mummy makes DC 11 WIS save or frightened until end of mummy's next turn; fail by 5+ also paralyzed. Success grants 24-hour immunity to mummies' glare (not mummy lords).
